service.name: ClearLift

seo.title: ClearLift® Laser in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Non-ablative collagen remodeling with minimal downtime. Improve texture, tone, and fine lines in a comfortable series.

overview.p1: ClearLift delivers non-ablative energy beneath the surface to stimulate collagen with little to no downtime.
overview.p2: We schedule a comfortable series so texture and tone improve gradually while you keep up with life.

whyReluxe.title: No-downtime approach
whyReluxe.body: Collagen remodeling without taking days off.

whyReluxe.title: Series that stack
whyReluxe.body: Cumulative results mapped on a simple cadence.

whyReluxe.title: Comfort-led care
whyReluxe.body: Cooling and techniques to keep visits easy.

service.tagline: Non-ablative collagen remodeling with minimal downtime.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

flexEverything.intro: A favorite for subtle tightening and polish.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
